_header: Now man behold this worlds vanities
Subjects: death; advice, moral; vanity, against worldly
_description: Moralizing verses on the inevitability of death — five quatrains (abab), including refrain phrase, ‘…doutles þow man de’

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Now man behald þis warldis vaniteisThe Ioy I wait of it is
                    fantasye…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Be k[ ]d and dreid þe creuell pane of hellChe[ ] þe
                    þat ane for doutles þou man de
CamMagPep2553.Editions:
Craigie,  William Alexander. 
             The Maitland Folio Manuscript, Containing Poems by Sir Richard
                Maitland, Dunbar, Douglas, Henryson, and others.
             2 vols. 
             Scottish Text Society
